data.title: About RioTinto Brochure
data.meta_description: About RioTinto Brochure - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Rio Tinto is a global mining and metals company that supplies metals and minerals essential for modern infrastructure and technology. It has over 71,000 employees operating in over 40 countries. Rio Tinto has a diverse portfolio of businesses including mines, refineries, smelters, power stations and research facilities. Its major products are aluminum, copper, diamonds, coal, iron ore, uranium, gold and industrial minerals. The company aims to maximize shareholder value through sustainable mining and operating large, low-cost assets.
